

._expandoSection {
}

._expandoSectionHead {
	font-size:12px;
	font-weight:bold;
	background-color:#ffc795; 
	border-bottom:1px solid #cccccc;
	border-width:1 0 1 1;
	height:16px;	
	cursor:pointer;
}

._expandoSectionL1 {
	border-left:1px solid #cccccc;
	margin-left:3px;
	margin-bottom:15px;
	cursor:pointer; 
	display:none;	
}

._expandoSectionSubHead	{	
	background-color:#eeeeee; 
	border-bottom:1px solid #cccccc;
	height:16px;	
	cursor:pointer;
}

._expandoSectionL2 {	
	border-bottom:1px solid #cccccc;
	padding-bottom:2px;
	padding-left:10px; 
	padding-bottom:10px;
	cursor:pointer; 
	display:none;
}

#tTOC {
	border-bottom:1px solid #cccccc;
}

.WikiTOC ul {
	margin-top:0px;
	padding-left:10px;
	list-style-type:none;
}

.WikiTOC li {}
